TopicTitle: If one kerbal is stranded on the mun...?

Articles.Content: I didn\'t saw any questions about this anywhere. So, if the rocket land on the mun and explodes but one kerbal is alive, it remains there until rescue or another method exists to bring him back to his home planet ?

send a rescue ship up!

Get a 3-man capsule on the launch pad and EVA one of the Kerbals aboard so you have a spare seat. send the rescue ship to the Mun, land it carefully then get your stranded kerbal to board the rescue ship!
Or you can go to the tracking station, choose the kerbal and load it up, then just 'End Flight'.
